title: Open Hearts
actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Sonja Richter, Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Paprika Steen
plot: SPOILER: Cecilie is devastated when her fianc√©e Joachim is seriously injured in a car accident and is paralyzed from the neck down. However their relationship evolves in an affair which threatens Niels family.
